address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x5A`.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

release_debounce.docs:
**, int**: The minimum length that no touch is recognized before a release event is created. Range is from 0 to 7. Defaults to 0.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

release_threshold.docs:
**, int**: The release defines the sensitivity for touch detection and should be between 5 and 30. Defaults to 6.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

touch_debounce.docs:
**, int**: The minimum length before a touch is recognized. Range is from 0 to 7. Defaults to 0.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

touch_threshold.docs:
**, int**: The touch threshold for all channels. This defines the sensitivity for touch detection and should be between 5 and 30 (lower = more sensitive). Defaults to 12. Typically the touch threshold is a little bigger than the release threshold.

*See also: [mpr121 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: The channel number at the MPR121 the touchkey is connected to.

*See also: [mpr121 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#binary-sensor)*

mpr121_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the MPR121 defined above. Useful for multiple MPR121’s on the I²C bus

*See also: [mpr121 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#binary-sensor)*

release_threshold.docs:
**, int**: A per-channel override of the global release_threshold value. If not specified, uses the global value.

*See also: [mpr121 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#binary-sensor)*

touch_threshold.docs:
**, int**: A per-channel override of the global touch_threshold value. If not specified, uses the global value.

*See also: [mpr121 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/mpr121.html#binary-sensor)*
